result.title: Description of a versatile benefit assessment approach and arctic resilience societal indicators for the Arctic observation system (T5.1)
result.description: A report will describe the tool cluster based on alternative context-sensitized coherent valuation approaches and describe what tool selection will be activated for different cases. The report will further include the outcomes of virtual workshops with PS participants and their stakeholders

result.title: Report of the kick-off meeting
result.description: Report of the kick-off meeting (T6.1).The consortium is considering a small online kick-off in September 2022, followed by a physical encounter of the consortium members in October 2022.
